differences.definitionAfter:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Employee]
(
[empID] [int] NULL,
[firstName] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
[lastName] [varchar] (255) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
